definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Ovums were washed and inseminated artificially.
sentences.chinese: 解剖法獲取精卵，人工授精。

sentences.english: The third chapter on the legal status of children born of artificial insemination of that.
sentences.chinese: 第三章對人工授精所生子女法律地位的認定。

sentences.english: The results mentioned above were analogous with those of spermatophore transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 類似於用精莢進行人工授精的實驗結果。

sentences.english: Artificial insemination was applied to the bactrian camel breeding.
sentences.chinese: 駱駝配種採用人工授精。

sentences.english: The twins are the product of artificial insemination.
sentences.chinese: 這對雙胞胎是人工授精的產物。

sentences.english: His baby girl was conceived through artificial insemination using donor sperm and Beatie's own eggs.
sentences.chinese: 用捐贈者的精子和比提的卵子經過人工授精產下女嬰。

sentences.english: The gadget is used to artificially inseminate cows.
sentences.chinese: 這個器具被用來爲母牛實施人工授精。

definition: cleavage of fertilized ovum into cells
parthenogenesis (biol. a female reproducing without fertilization)
